abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Fubon Financial are among the bidders for Morgan Stanley’s stake in Chinese investment bank CICC, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday, in a deal that could be worth more than $1 billion.
snippet: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Fubon Financial are among the bidders for Morgan Stanley’s stake in Chinese investment bank CICC, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday, in a deal that could be worth more than $1 billion.
lead_paragraph: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Fubon Financial are among the bidders for Morgan Stanley‘s stake in Chinese investment bank C.I.C.C., people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday, in a deal that could be worth more than $1 billion.

headline.main: K.K.R. and Fubon Said to Bid on C.I.C.C. Stake
